About.summary: Johnny is a Fullstack Developer with a diploma from Code Institute. His experience as a gaming coach sharpened his problem-solving and adaptability. He builds responsive, user-friendly web apps with attention to detail and values clarity and efficiency in all his work.

Education.title: 2024 Full Stack Software Development Diploma
Education.description: Completed a full-stack software development course covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, Django, and React. Learned to build complete dynamic web applications from scratch by integrating both frontend and backend technologies.

Education.title: 2023 Self-Taught Developer
Education.description: Built a solid foundation in full-stack development through self-directed learning. Focused on HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Python. Developed adaptability and a growth mindset.

Career.title: 2024 AI Contractor
Career.description: Contributed to training large language models using RLHF. Performed detailed evaluations, ranked responses, corrected outputs, and delivered feedback to improve conversational quality.

Career.title: 2023 Content Creator & Coach
Career.description: Produced personalized coaching videos and responded to user questions. Helped build a learning-focused gaming community through direct communication and detailed feedback.

Career.title: 2019 Coach & Scriptwriter
Career.description: Coached over 2000 clients in Valorant and Fortnite. Wrote engaging scripts for YouTube videos, blending storytelling with gaming tips for a million-subscriber audience.

Projects.description: A mashup of Valorant and Tic-Tac-Toe using basic web tech for a fun interactive twist.
A fullstack peer code review platform designed for developers to collaborate and enhance code quality.
A personal gamer showcase site with visuals and layout inspired by gaming profiles.
Classic Snake game with a Python backend rendered through a web terminal emulator.
A social platform for gamers to connect, chat, and share hobbies in a supportive community.
This very portfolio site â€” showcasing Johnny's projects, skills, and contact info. Built in React and styled with care.

Hackathons.description: An accessibility-focused platform designed to promote inclusive education and experiences. Johnny worked as a frontend developer and designer, emphasizing UI clarity and usability.
Hackathons.stack: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, UX/UI Design, Accessibility

Hackathons.description: A holiday-themed trivia game with multiple-choice questions about Christmas traditions. Johnny built the frontend and focused on engaging UI/UX.
A Star Wars-themed encyclopedia exploring different lightsabers and characters. Johnny contributed as a fullstack developer and co-scrum master, focusing on frontend implementation and design.
A Net Present Value (NPV) calculator app to evaluate investments. Johnny built the frontend and helped document the project.
Hackathons.stack: React, CSS, JavaScript, UI Design, Documentation

Hackathons.description: A medication reminder and tracker app focused on patient accessibility. Johnny led the UI/UX design using Figma and user testing to ensure a clean experience.
Hackathons.stack: React, Figma, UX/UI Design, Accessibility, JavaScript

Hackathons.description: A web app to help users find ideal gifts for loved ones based on personality and preferences. Johnny worked on all functions, including design for the About page and mouse animations.
Hackathons.stack: JavaScript, CSS, UI Design, Animation, Fullstack
